Legal_Issue: Whether the marriage was genuine and whether procedural fairness was observed
Outcome: Application allowed, decision quashed, matter remitted for reconsideration
Evidence_Type: Testimony, financial records, phone bills, photographs
Legal_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations - genuineness of marriage
Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered primarily for immigration benefits
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of financial intermingling, inconsistencies in evidence
Application_Error: Failure to inform applicant of specific concerns prior to decision
Evidence_Ignored: Phone bill discrepancies, photo identification issues
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations - genuine relationship requirement
Outcome_of_Review: Decision quashed, remitted for reconsideration by a different panel
Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient proof of shared life, inconsistent statements
Procedural_Fairness: Breach due to failure to raise specific concerns with applicant
Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Procedural_Issue: Failure to provide applicant opportunity to respond to key concerns
Omission_Type: Failure to disclose specific evidentiary concerns
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Misrepresentation related to genuineness of marriage
